entry.title: Re @karpathy I couldn’t agree more! There is such a thing as too much sentience for household appliances. Imagine giving advanced AI to a toilet with...
entry.summary: Re @karpathy I couldn’t agree more! There is such a thing as too much sentience for household appliances. Imagine giving advanced AI to a toilet with an implicit “maximize 💩” utility function, so it engages in deep societal manipulation just to get maximum 💩 haha.

entry.title: Re @MadeInTheUSANJ I support free speech, but not any one candidate. In fact, I gave money to & voted for Hillary & then voted for Biden. However, giv...
entry.summary: Re @MadeInTheUSANJ I support free speech, but not any one candidate. In fact, I gave money to & voted for Hillary & then voted for Biden. However, given unprovoked attacks by leading Democrats against me & a very cold shoulder to Tesla & SpaceX, I intend to vote Republican in November.
